(\{ (\{ 4, 4 \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "Some of the combinations might be the same as other combination. This is because combining two colors always produces two colors in return. Sometimes two different colors. (\{ (\{ 4, 4 \}), (\{ "text", "\
Seamstresses\\\r\\n\\Notice\\\
\\r\\nPlease be aware that the teacher we have in the new building can teach the following things:\\r\\n\\\r\\n \
\Courtesan\ - Explination not needed\\\r\\n \
\Healer\ - Take at least one level to learn to make bandages\\\r\\n \
\Seamstress\ - Explination not needed\\\r\\n \
\Tailor\ - Explination not needed\\\r\\n \
\Milliner\ - The skill to allow the making of hats\\\r\\n \
\Musician\ - For the club\\\r\\n \
\Hairdresser\ - Explination not needed\\\r\\n\" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
